text: There is a baseline for acceptabe quality and correctness when placing an order with a franchise or fast food restaurant. Time and again, this Pizza Hut location is on time with a properly prepared product. When an order is a few minutes â€¦More

text: Great service even though they were very busy my server never let my drink get low and provided great customer service will be back very soon. Great food.

text: The restaurant is under new management.  It was super good. The server was very attentive.  The manager stopped by to check on us.  Give it a try.

name: dee wolfe
text: It was a little busy but the guys did an fantastic job, very polite and patient, the pizza and bread sticks were perfectly done, best pizza hut pizza I have had in a long time! The 2 guys never complained about being short staffed ( it was obvious ), they NEVER fell short on service or product. Highly impressed ðŸ˜€

name: R. Ian Bequeath
text: Nice place to stop for a quick bite. Decent service, and the pie was classic Pizza Hut. The feel of the restaurant however was more like a diner than Italian. Overall, I was satisfied.

name: PortGamer 408
text: All food was great, under new managment. Will definitely be ordering again, could tell by the cleanliness of the place that it's under new managment. I understand if a place like this gets busy, they might miss wiping a table. But they were all clean, that's a plus for me.
